state_description: This screen prompts the user to quit certain applications to allow CleanMyMac X to clean related items effectively. It lists applications that should be quit and provides options to quit them individually or all at once.

enables.name: Quit Claude
enables.description: Quits the application named Claude to proceed with cleaning.

enables.name: Quit Code
enables.description: Quits the application named Code to proceed with cleaning.

enables.name: Quit Safari
enables.description: Quits the application named Safari to proceed with cleaning.

enables.name: Ignore
enables.description: Ignores the prompt and continues without quitting any applications.

enables.name: Quit All
enables.description: Quits all listed applications to proceed with cleaning.
